ABOUT.GREETING:
Hi, I'm Andreas.
For me, programming extends far beyond mere syntax; it is a creative means of expression.

Let’s collaborate to architect the digital world and build something truly extraordinary.

SKILL.COMPETENCE: In my projects, I have used a variety of front-end technologies – for both static and dynamic websites. I have implemented responsive layouts. Everything with heart and enthusiasm.
SKILL.OVERLAY_INTERESSE: Feel free to contact me. I am eager to expand my existing knowledge and learn new things.

PORTFOLIO.SUBTITLE: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with the projects to see my skills in action.
PORTFOLIO.JOIN_DESC: A Kanban-style task manager that lets you create, organize, and move tasks using drag-and-drop, while also assigning users and categories to each task.
PORTFOLIO.LOCO_DESC: A fast-paced jump-and-run game where you guide Loco Poco through obstacles, collect items, and reach the finish line across fun, challenging levels. Hola!
PORTFOLIO.JOIN_DIAL: Through working in a team, I learned how to communicate better, share responsibilities, and collaborate to find solutions together.
PORTFOLIO.POCO_DIAL: While building this game, I sharpened my problem-solving skills and taught myself how to design engaging game mechanics, smooth animations, and well-structured levels.

REFERENCE.TEAM_SAY: What my colleagues say about me
REFERENCE.TEAM1: Throughout his training, Andreas was reliable and motivated. He worked well both independently and in a team.
REFERENCE.TEAM2: In the project, Andreas stood out for his structured way of working. He completed his tasks on time and approached problems calmly.
REFERENCE.TEAM3: Andreas was a reliable team partner. He communicated clearly, supported others, and worked responsibly, helping maintain a positive team atmosphere.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let’s turn coffee into code
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Got something you want to build?
CONTACT.TITLEMAIL: Reach out, tell me what you’re creating, and let’s turn your idea into something remarkable together.
CONTACT.PLACEFIVE: What do you want from me?
CONTACT.PLACESIX: Hello Andreas, you want a coffee?

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.GENERAL_TEXT: This Privacy Policy explains how personal data is collected and processed when you use this website.
PRIVACY.NAME: Andreas Kissner
PRIVACY.DATA_TEXT: When you use this website, certain data may be collected automatically, such as your IP address, browser type, and time of access.
PRIVACY.FORM_TEXT: If you contact me via the contact form, your name, email address, and message will be stored for the purpose of processing your request.
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_TEXT: The collected data is used only to provide and improve this website and to respond to inquiries.
PRIVACY.SHARING_TEXT: Your personal data will not be shared with third parties unless required by law.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_TEXT: Appropriate technical and organizational measures are taken to protect your data against unauthorized access.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to request information about your stored data and to request correction or deletion at any time.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact:
